channel.title: Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [QAC-7753] Revoke sessions with non-existent member - should return 404
item.description: Ensures appropriate error when attempting to revoke sessions for a non-existent member.
item.summary: Revoke sessions with non-existent member - should return 404

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.title: [QAC-7752] Revoke sessions with invalid member ID format - should return 400
item.description: Validates that malformed member IDs are rejected when revoking sessions.
item.summary: Revoke sessions with invalid member ID format - should return 400

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.title: [QAC-7751] Revoke member sessions with valid member - should return 204
item.description: Verifies successful revocation of all sessions for an existing member.
item.summary: Revoke member sessions with valid member - should return 204

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.title: [QAC-7750] Get member sessions with non-existent member - should return 404
item.description: Ensures appropriate error when attempting to retrieve sessions for a non-existent member.
item.summary: Get member sessions with non-existent member - should return 404

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.title: [QAC-7749] Get member sessions with invalid organization ID - should return 400
item.description: Validates that malformed organization IDs are rejected when retrieving sessions.
item.summary: Get member sessions with invalid organization ID - should return 400

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.title: [QAC-7748] Get member sessions with valid member - should return 200
item.description: Verifies successful retrieval of session list for an existing member.
item.summary: Get member sessions with valid member - should return 200

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.title: [QAC-7747] Create member with duplicate roles - should return 400
item.description: Ensures that duplicate role assignments (case-insensitive) are detected and rejected.
item.summary: Create member with duplicate roles - should return 400

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.title: [QAC-7746] Create member with role containing invalid character - should return 400
item.description: Validates that role names with invalid characters (e.g. numbers) are rejected.
item.summary: Create member with role containing invalid character - should return 400

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.title: [QAC-7745] Create member with role exceeding 50 characters - should return 400
item.description: Tests boundary validation for role names exceeding the 50 character maximum.
item.summary: Create member with role exceeding 50 characters - should return 400

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.title: [QAC-7744] Create member with null role in list - should return 400
item.description: Ensures that null values within the roles list are properly rejected.
item.summary: Create member with null role in list - should return 400

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.title: [QAC-7743] Create member with empty roles list - should return 400
item.description: Validates that members cannot be created without at least one role assigned.
item.summary: Create member with empty roles list - should return 400

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.title: [QAC-7742] Member CRUD lifecycle - create read update delete
item.description: Comprehensive end-to-end test covering the full member lifecycle from creation through deletion.
item.summary: Member CRUD lifecycle - create read update delete

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.summary: Create member with last name exceeding 100 characters - should return 400

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.summary: Create member with first name exceeding 100 characters - should return 400

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
